About Me

I am a freelance web developer located in South Austin looking to make and improve websites across Austin and Houston. I am originally from Houston but have recently moved to Austin to enjoy the city and look for new oppurtunities in the computer science world. I've been programming for about 5 years now and can say that I have genuine passion for anything computer science related, whether it be making websites, building a chess engine, or building a computer from scratch.
